name: Aviral Tripathi

full_output.summary: Seeking to leverage my skills in machine learning, data science, and data analysis to contribute to an innovative organiza- tion. I aim to develop scalable models, extract insights from data, and support data-driven decisions while continuously learning and enhancing my technical and analytical abilities. My goal is to grow professionally in a dynamic company that offers challenging opportunities and allows me to make a meaningful impact.

projects.name: Fake News Detection
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to classify news articles as real or fake using features like text data, source credibility, and metadata. Applied Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques for text preprocessing, and implemented various classification algorithms such as Logistic Regression and Random Forest.

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis on IMDb Reviews
projects.description: Built a sentiment analysis model to classify movie reviews as positive or negative based on IMDb data. Utilized NLP techniques like tokenization, stop word removal, and TF-IDF vectorization, and applied algorithms such as Naive Bayes and Support Vector Machine (SVM).

projects.name: Analysis of the Factors Affecting Sales Price of Houses in King County, USA
projects.description: Conducted a comprehensive analysis of housing data to identify factors influencing house prices in King County, USA. Applied data visualization techniques to explore relationships between features such as location, square footage, and number of bedrooms, and the sales price.

experiences.description: Developed a machine learning model for loan status prediction, analyzing features such as income, loan amount, credit history, and applicant demographics. Evaluated model performance using metrics such as accuracy, precision, and recall, and optimized the model to enhance prediction reliability.

full_output.name: Aviral Tripathi
